Summary Note:
Lambrechts Peters Goossens and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Berlin. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Lambrechts Peters Goossens is a 55 year old and comes from Germany.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Lambrechts Peters Goossens and Gabriella have been married since 1994. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Lambrechts obtained his secondary school diploma from Institut Saint-Joseph in 1989.
Lambrechts completed his university studies at Odisee University College in 1992.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 32 years, Lambrechts Peters Goossens brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Lambrechts Peters Goossens launched his career as a Research Scientist at Qiagen N.V., where he gained valuable experience from 1993 to 1998.
At Merck KGaA, he held the position of Biotech Startup Founder from 1999 to 2025, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 510000 EUR.
He owns flat in Gelsenkirchen, where he resides. It is worth 920000 EUR.

He inherited 2320000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Private Equity Manager, in 2013, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
